content: the claire bun beanie is super cute and a great pattern for beginners this pattern includes 23 high quality images to help explain each step and links to the specific supplies used in the pattern *********************************************************************************** disclaimer this is a pdf crochet pattern to make a messy bun beanie not the actual finished item there will be no refunds for failure to read the listing details this listing is clearly for a crochet pattern thank you *********************************************************************************** sizes this pattern is for an adult size beanie fitting heads with 22 -23 circumference and a child size beanie fitting heads with a 20 -21 circumference skill level beginner terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials needed 4-5oz worsted weight yarn i 5 5mm crochet hook for adult size h 5mm crochet hook for child size pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sale my pattern in any way you are more than welcome to sell your finished claire bun beanies i hope they are a very hot item for you you may not use my pictures and pass them off as your own for they are my property thank you for your understanding if you do post any pictures of your claire bun beanies i would love to see them you can use the #clairebunbeanie or #acraftyconcept so i can see and so other makers can find the pattern for themselves i truly believe there are enough customers to go around so sharing information is a great way for us makers to inspire and encourage each other i can t wait to see your finished claire bun beanies
